Note: For a slightly later text see 2042.
_description: Verses warning Sinners to beware — fifty-nine six-line stanzas (aabaab or aabccb)

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Þees holy gostes myhteVs helpe and rede and
                    dihte…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines: …Among þan englen bryhteWunyen and beo mote
